question: For resistance to Oxaliplatin in Colon Cancer, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Oxaliplatin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Oxaliplatin'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Oxaliplatin')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Colon')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Oxaliplatin')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Find therapies that target resistance genes for Bicalutamide in Prostate Carcinoma.

)

)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Bicalutamide')

  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,

LIMIT 100

question: For resistance to Akt Inhibitor MK2206 in Breast Cancer, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?

  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Akt Inhibitor MK2206')

  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Akt Inhibitor MK2206')

  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Docetaxel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Docetaxel'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Docetaxel')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Stomach')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Docetaxel')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Which drugs target biomarkers of resistance to Bafetinib in Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Bafetinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Bafetinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Bafetinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Cancer')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Bafetinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Iodine I-131')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Iodine I-131'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Iodine I-131')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Thyroid Gland Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Iodine I-131')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Selumetinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Selumetinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Selumetinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Colorectal')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Selumetinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Ceritinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Tisagenlecleucel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Tisagenlecleucel'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Tisagenlecleucel')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('B-lymphoblastic Leukemia/lymphoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Tisagenlecleucel')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: In B-lymphoblastic Leukemia/lymphoma, what therapies target genes causing resistance to Cytarabine?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Cytarabine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cytarabine'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cytarabine')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('B-lymphoblastic Leukemia/lymphoma')

WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL

WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Cytarabine')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('FLT3/ABL/Aurora Kinase Inhibitor KW-2449')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FLT3/ABL/Aurora Kinase Inhibitor KW-2449'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('FLT3/ABL/Aurora Kinase Inhibitor KW-2449')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Acute Myeloid Leukemia')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('FLT3/ABL/Aurora Kinase Inhibitor KW-2449')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Venetoclax')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Venetoclax'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Venetoclax')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia/small Lymphocytic Lymphoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Venetoclax')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Immune Checkpoint Inhibitor')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Immune Checkpoint Inhibitor'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Immune Checkpoint Inhibitor')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Melanoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Immune Checkpoint Inhibitor')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)

RETURN
  gene_symbol,

LIMIT 100
